## Biography
Hello! I am currently a senior majoring in Behavior Neuroscience and plan to graduate Spring 2025. My research interests revolve around understanding the various behaviors and contributors that influence communication with patients along with diagnostic research of psychological disorders. My career goal is to attend medical school and become a practicing physician.

## Semesters

- Spring 2025, *Research Assistant*
- Fall 2024, *Research Assistant*
